name: ide-typescript
description: TypeScript and JavaScript language support for Atom-IDE.

diagnosticsEnabled.description: Use the TypeScript language server to provide diagnostics and warnings.

path.title: TypeScript server path
path.description: Path to a TypeScript `tsserver.js` the language server will use to process TypeScript. Defaults to the bundled version.

javascriptSupport.title: JavaScript support
javascriptSupport.description: Use the TypeScript language server to also provide services for JavaScript.

ignoreFlow.title: Ignore Flow project folders
ignoreFlow.description: Ignore project folders that contain a Flow `.flowconfig` file.

autocompleteResultsFirst.title: Show autocomplete results first
autocompleteResultsFirst.description: Suggestions will be placed before the rest of autocomplete results (e.g. snippets etc). Requires restart to take effect.

enum.description: On their own to the left (like other languages)
Following parameters to the right (like source code)

returnTypeInAutocomplete.description: Where return types are shown in AutoComplete.
